titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 84.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/12/2000--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from April 13 or 14, 2000, until May 2, 2000, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from April 13 or 14, 2000, until April 25, 2000.
